document.full_text: violent storms ripped across oklahoma and arkansas overnight, killing at least six people including a 6-year-old child, and cutting a path of destruction through several towns, authorities said on friday.
document.title: tornadoes overnight leave at least six dead
lines_and_colors: violent storms ripped across oklahoma and arkansas overnight, killing at least six people including a 6-year-old child, and cutting a path of destruction through several towns, authorities said on friday.
